alert.note: Alert for Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland Liberty; Inland McIntosh; Long (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 7:34PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LIBERTY, MCINTOSH AND LONG COUNTIES... At 734 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Tibet, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Darien, Tibet, Jones, Riceboro, Wolf Island, Harris Neck, St. Catherines Island and Eulonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland Liberty; Inland McIntosh; Long
